import React from 'react'; import { X, Plus, Minus } from 'lucide-react'; import PaymentForm from '../PaymentForm/PaymentForm'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const CartModal = ({ showCart, setShowCart, showPayment, setShowPayment, items, updateQuantity, total, handleCheckout, handlePaymentSubmit }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleBackToShop = () => { setShowCart(false); navigate('/shop'); }; return ( <> {/* Cart Modal */} {showCart && (

Shopping Cart

{items.length === 0 ? (

Your cart is empty

) : ( <>
{items.map((item) => (

{item.product.name}

{item.product.category?.main} {item.product.category?.sub && `› ${item.product.category.sub}`}

${item.product.price}

{item.quantity}
))}
Total: ${total.toFixed(2)}
)}
)} {/* Payment Modal */} {showPayment && (

Checkout

)} ); }; export default CartModal;
